bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a disease caused by lice in the pubic hair with itching in the genital region. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yin xing 銀杏 quotes Liu chang chun fang 劉長春方 : 陰虱作癢：陰毛際肉中生蟲如 虱，或紅或白，癢不可忍者 , “Itching caused by yin lice : worms like lice grow in the flesh at the border of the pubic hair. They may be red or white. The itching is unbearable”.
